nodes.text: The Starless Expanse was a region in the galaxy which contained the space station Starlight Beacon.

The name Starless Expanse was mentioned in an excerpt of the comic book issue The High Republic 1 included in The High Republic Free Digital Sampler. The final version of the comic, however, omitted the term. It was decided to drop the location early on in the development process as there were clearly stars in the background of the panel with the label.
